content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )

content.text: 1 (1.27 ounce) packet dry fajita seasoning, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (1.27 ounce) packet dry fajita seasoning, divided" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained" )
( ing-6 "1 (10 ounce) package mixed salad greens" )

content.text: 0) Rub chicken evenly with 1/2 the fajita seasoning.
1) Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken 8 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear; set aside.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the oil"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a skillet"@19:28 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@34:45 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@51:55 / AC
		:ppt ( "the chicken"@56:67 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "8 minutes"@68:77 / DUR )
		:mnr ( "on each side"@81:90 / OTHER )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until juices run clear"@95:117 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "set aside"@119:128 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a large saucepan, mix beans, corn, salsa and other 1/2 of fajita seasoning.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "mix"@24:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "beans"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "corn"@35:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salsa"@41:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "other 1/2 of fajita seasoning"@51:80 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Heat over medium heat until warm.
4) Prepare the salad by tossing the greens, onion and tomato.
5) Top salad with chicken and dress with the bean and corn mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Top"@3:6 / AC
		:gol ( "salad"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "chicken"@18:25 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "dress"@30:35 / AC
		:ppt ( "the bean"@41:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "corn mixture"@54:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
